divs: Sighting DetailsThis was a documented sighting, this thing stopped traffic on a major street and was seen by many people. I was about 10 years old, on the walk home from the park at 81st. & Ashland Av. in the ideal food mart parking lot behind where i lived @ 8139 Marshfield there was 4 of us and we herd the sound of drivers on Ashland Av slamming on the brakes we turned around and saw a very large craft at about 300 feet off the ground moving very slow it passed over us going west then it stopped hovered and was gone in the blink of an eye. on 12-25-09 i was watching the UFO marathon on the history ch. and they had a case where a man and his wife saw a UFO and some time later he found an implant in his arm, well this hit home with me because i have had this thing in my leg for as long as i can remember. so i'm thinking, could this thing in my leg be made of metal? so i get my metal detector out and shure enough it went off. could this be what i think it is?
Summary: very large craft with lights no sound moving slow then heading off at a high rate of speed
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around May 31st 1964
